doc:
Bud Cort https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bud_Cort 0 Bud Cort (born Walter Edward Cox; March 29, 1951) is an American film and stage actor, comedian, writer, director and voice artist widely known for his portrayals of Harold in Hal Ashby's 1971 film Harold and Maude and the eponymous hero in Robert Altman's 1970 film Brewster McCloud. Bud_Cort ( born Walter_Edward_Cox ; March_29_,_1951 ) is an_American_film_and_stage_actor , comedian_,_writer_,_director_and_voice_artist widely_known for his_portrayals of Harold in Hal_Ashby 's 1971_film Harold_and_Maude and the_eponymous_hero in Robert_Altman 's 1970_film Brewster_McCloud .
